```{r setup, include=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width=5, fig.height=3) 
#knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
library(e1071)
library(rmarkdown)
library(glmnet)

```

```{r}
training_df = read.csv("train.csv")
```

```{r}
training_df = training_df %>% 
  select(-c(thumbnail_url, name, X)) %>%
  mutate(price = exp(log_price))

head(training_df)
```
# Variable Descriptions:
## Log Price
```{r}
ggplot(data = training_df) +
  geom_histogram(aes(log_price), bins = 50) +
  ggtitle("Log Price")

```

## Price
```{r}
ggplot(data = training_df) +
  geom_histogram(aes(price), bins = 100) +
  ggtitle("Listing Price ($)") + 
  geom_vline(xintercept = median(training_df$price), color = "blue", lty = 2)

```

## Property Type
```{r}
training_df %>%
  group_by(property_type) %>%
  summarise(Total = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(Total))

training_df %>%
  group_by(room_type) %>%
  summarise(Total = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(Total))
```

## City
```{r}

```
